factoid: Anna Mikháylovna told Natásha the contents of the letter.

Natásha said she would not tell anyone.
Natásha crossed herself.

Sónya said perhaps Anna Mikháylovna deceived Natásha.

Pétya said he would have killed so many Frenchmen that there would have been a heap of them.

Pétya said that people who cry about trifles are goose.

Sónya smiled.
Natásha said she does not remember Borís.
Natásha said she does not remember Borís a bit.

Natásha said she would not write to Borís.

Sónya said he would never cease to love Natásha's brother as long as he lived.
